Post.title: Spring Boot
Post._content:
# Spring Boot
## 
Spring Boot makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring based Applications that you can "just run".

We take an opinionated view of the Spring platform and third-party libraries so you can get started with minimum fuss. Most Spring Boot applications need very little Spring configuration.

Spring BootSpringSpringXML

---

Spring Boottomcatlogback

## Spring Boot
    - Create stand-alone Spring applications
    - Embed Tomcat, Jetty or Undertow directly (no need to deploy WAR files)
    - Provide opinionated 'starter' dependencies to simplify your build configuration
    - Automatically configure Spring and 3rd party libraries whenever possible
    - Provide production-ready features such as metrics, health checks and externalized configuration
    - Absolutely no code generation and no requirement for XML configuration

# Spring Boot 
## Hello World
## RESTful Web Service

# 
- [Spring Boot -github](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot)
- [Spring Boot ](https://spring.io/projects/spring-boot)
- [](http://www.cnblogs.com/larryzeal/p/5765945.html)
-

Post.title: Alibaba Java
Post._content:
# Alibaba Java
20171014JavaJava

[alibaba/p3c](https://github.com/alibaba/p3c)


- : *[Java](https://github.com/alibaba/p3c/blob/master/%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E5%B7%B4%E5%B7%B4Java%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E6%89%8B%E5%86%8C%EF%BC%88%E8%AF%A6%E5%B0%BD%E7%89%88%EF%BC%89.pdf)*
- English Version: *[Alibaba Java Coding Guidelines](https://alibaba.github.io/Alibaba-Java-Coding-Guidelines)*
- Java: *[Java](https://detail.tmall.com/item.htm?spm=a1z2e.8325951.feedDetail.4.3315431gklIXe&id=562626792765&ns=1&abbucket=14)*
- : *[Java](https://detail.tmall.com/item.htm?spm=a230r.1.14.40.7dee7d6bwpO82U&id=575107529181&ns=1&abbucket=20)*

# Eclipse
## 
 - Eclipse Juno+
 - maven3.+
 - JDK 1.7+

## 
- [](https://p3c.alibaba.com/plugin/eclipse/update/plugin.zip)
- 

## 
EclispeHelp >> Install New Software,InstallAdd...Add RepositoryNameURLAdd
```
Name: alibaba-p3c #
Location: https://p3c.alibaba.com/plugin/eclipse/update
```
![](../upload/alibaba-p3c-plugin-setup/install-add-repository.png)
Security WarningInstall anyway
![](../upload/alibaba-p3c-plugin-setup/security-warning.png)
Eclipse, 
![](../upload/alibaba-p3c-plugin-setup/software-update-restart.png)
## 
![](../upload/alibaba-p3c-plugin-setup/ecipse-use-p3c-plugin.png)
# IntelliJ IDEA
## 
  - Project JDK: 1.7+
  - Gradle: 3.0+Require JDK1.8+ for gradle

## 
- [](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/10046-alibaba-java-coding-guidelines)
- 

## 
IntelliJ IDEASettings >> Plugins
"alibaba"plugin,'Alibaba Java Coding Guidelines' plugin 
![](../upload/alibaba-p3c-plugin-setup/idea-p3c-plugin-setup.png)
IntelliJ IDEA
## 

## 
 - [github-alibaba/p3c](https://github.com/alibaba/p3c)
